SettingsClass module

class SettingsClass.Settings(PathToJSON)[source]

Bases: object

A simple class to handle global and local settings.

CheckDep(ClassName)[source]

Checks if all dependencies are correct, ie if the files specified in settings.json are called inside the main LaTeX document.

Parameters

ClassName (_type_) – target LaTeX class. It must be a supported LaTeX Class

Returns

_description_

Return type

_type_

GetClassDep(ClassName) → list[source]

Get all LaTeX dependencies for a specified supported LaTeX class.

Parameters

ClassName (str) – name of the class. This parameter must be the same as those specified in settings.json.

Returns

a list of dependencies (as file names with extensions stored as strings.)

Return type

list[str]

GetClassList() → list[source]

Get the list of supported LaTeX document classes.

Returns

a list of all supported document classes specified in settings.json

Return type

list

GetPathToSource()[source]

Get the path to LaTeX source files from the “PathToSource” field in settings.json.

Returns

Path to the folder containing LaTeX source files required to generate a new project.

Return type

str

GetSettings() → dict[source]

Loads the global settings from settings.json :return: _description_ :rtype: _type_
